title: No Datasource Name
description: the name for the datasource was not set. please check your request

title: Empty Datasource Name
description: the name for the datasource is empty. please check your request

title: Empty Datasource Description
description: the description for the datasource is empty. please check your request

title: Metadata Missing
description: the multipart-form indicated that metadata was supposed to be sent, but none was found

title: Metadata Invalid
description: the properties of the metadata do not match the expected properties.

title: JSON Invalid
description: the contents of the metadata field was not valid json

title: Unknown Metadata Field
description: the metadata contains a field that is not known to the system

title: API Configuration Missing
description: the multipart-form indicated that a api configuration was supposed to be sent, but none was found

title: Metadata Invalid
description: the contents of the api configuration field was not valid json

title: Unknown Metadata Field
description: the api configuration contains a field that is not known to the system

title: Invalid UUID Format
description: the uuid provided is not a valid uuid

title: No Datasource Found
description: the uuid or name provided in the url does not match any known data source

title: No API Configured
description: the uuid provided in the url points to a data source without a api configured

title: API Configuration Invalid
description: the api configuration stored in the database is not usable

title: Unable to Determine Proxy Mode
description: the system was unable to determine the proxy mode for the data source
